definitions: Make a visible impression or a line on (a surface).
Write or draw (a symbol or sign) on something.
Indicate the position of (something) by making a mark.
Designate (a place or time) for a particular purpose.
Assign a score or grade to (a piece of work).
Be a characteristic or distinguishing feature of.
Observe or celebrate (a special occasion or event).
Follow and guard (an opposing player) in a game.
examples: He marked the page with a bookmark.
A red flag marks the spot.
The event marked a turning point.
His kindness marks him as a good person.
